Hans Anton Aschenborn (1 Febụwarị 1888 - 10 Eprel 1931) bụ onye a ma ama na-ese anụmanụ nke anụ ọhịa Afrịka
Ọ bụ nna Dieter Aschenborn na nna nna Hans Ulrich Aschenborn, ha abụọ bụ ndị na-ese ihe.

Hans Anton rụrụ ọrụ na Germany na ndịda Africa. A na-egosipụta ọrụ ya na akwụkwọ nkà ihe ọmụma nka German Thieme-Becker ma ọ bụ Saur. Akwụkwọ edemede Master of Arts nke Karin Skawran dere banyere ọrụ eserese nke Hans Anton Aschenborn ka e bipụtara n'akwụkwọ akụkọ nka na ọdịbendị South Africa, Lantern na 1965.) Na 1963 Mahadum Pretoria bipụtara akwụkwọ banyere Aschenborn dị ka onye na-ese ihe akpọrọ, Hans Anton Aschenborn : Mens en Kunstenaar N'afọ 1970, ụlọ ngosi nka Pretoria (South Africa) sochiri ya ma mee edemede gbasara ọrụ ya. Akwụkwọ ndị ọzọ gbasara Aschenborn gosipụtara ihe osise ya na linocuts.
A maara ya nke ọma maka ihe osise ya nke akwụkwọ na dị ka onye edemede na onye na-ede uri
A ka na-egosi ọtụtụ ọrụ ya
E nwere ike ịchọta ya na Ịntanetị
A na-asọpụrụ ya dị ka onye ọsụ ụzọ n'ihe ngosi nke anụ ọhịa Afrịka

N'afọ 1916, o dere okwu nke abụ ahụ, "Heia Safari", nke ka na-ewu ewu. A sụgharịrị ụfọdụ n'ime akwụkwọ German ya n'asụsụ Afrikaans, na-enye ya ọrụ na akwụkwọ Afrikaans. Mgbe ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'akwụkwọ ya banyere gemsbok (nke a sụgharịrị n'asụsụ Bekee) ma na-ele ha anya nke ọma, Aschenborn chọpụtara ụdị dị iche iche a gụrụ aha ya, Genus Aschenborni.
N'ebe ndịda Afrịka, a na-asọpụrụ ya ugboro ugboro site na nraranye
Na Windhoek (Namibia) enwere Aschenborn Street, na Cape Town (South Africa) Hans Aschenborn Road.
A mụrụ ya na Kiel, Germany
N'afọ 1909, ọ kwagara Namibia, ebe ọ zụtara ugbo aha ya bụ, "Quickborn" n'afọ 1912
Ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara South Africa na 1920, tupu ọ laghachi Germany na 1921
Ọ nwụrụ na Kiel n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 1931.
Nwa ya nwoke, Dieter Aschenborn (15 Nọvemba 1915 - 11 Septemba 2002), na nwa nwa ya, Uli Aschenborn (6 Septemba 1947), bụkwa ndị a ma ama na-ese ihe anụmanụ na ndịda Afrịka
Enwere ike ịchọta ọrụ nka nke ndị Aschenborn atọ ahụ na gallery, ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie, na ụlọ ọha na eze nke Namibia
E mekwara ihe ngosi nke ọrụ nke ọgbọ atọ ahụ na Namibia n'afọ 1965.
